title: aDiyEnai maTTum
sahitya:
aDiyEnai maTTum kai viDuvadu muraiyO aDiyAraik-kaDaittETrum kaDamai Etra murugA


anupallavi

  aDaikkalam aDaindEn abhayam koDuppAi ena kiDaikkAviDil adu un koDaip-pugazhukk-azhanE


caraNam    vAn eTTavE pugazhai vaLaravE tEDi viTTu En adanai iviidham izhakka tuNidanaiyO nI
mAn vizhi manaiviyar mIdinil mighundiTTa maiyal tanil mUzhgi ayyO nI mayanginaiyO
